subject: College Athletics
Football
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Max Nikias, the president of Southern California, called a hearing on the university’s appeal to reduce N.C.A.A. football sanctions “good and fair.”
snippet: Max Nikias, the president of Southern California, called a hearing on the university’s appeal to reduce N.C.A.A. football sanctions “good and fair.”
